Projects

In Cal Robotics, we do a number of things, including connecting our club members with Robotics Resouces around campus and conducting our social activities. However, our main purpose is to do projects, both competetive and recreational. In this upcoming school year, you will have the opportunity to do your own projects. Want to start your own? Click here to find out more details!
